title: Hiking Abroad
description: Hiking and mountain photography from beyond the UK. From the trails above Megeve to the summit of Mont Joly, these images are taken on long days out in the Alps â€” often at dawn or dusk when the light transforms the landscape.

images.alt: Jagged Alpine peaks and the snow-capped Mont Blanc massif silhouetted against a warm orange and pink sunset sky
Silhouetted chairlift chairs hanging against a golden sunrise with hazy layered mountain ridges in the background
A fallen French warning sign for hikers lying in the grass on a sunny Alpine hillside
A winding gravel track leading past a small wooden hut toward sunlit brown and green mountain slopes under a clear sky
A lone hiker with a backpack checking a map on an open alpine meadow with a panoramic view of rugged mountain peaks beyond
A hiker with a large backpack and sleeping mat looking out over a sweeping valley and layered hazy mountains on the Mont Joly trail
A small chapel with a bell tower surrounded by sheep on a green hillside with misty autumn trees and a village below in Megeve
Golden evening light catching alpine meadows and pine forests with a dramatic rocky cliff face rising in the distance
Two large deciduous trees standing together on top of a rounded green hillock framed by mountains and blue sky near Megeve
Three silhouetted figures standing on a metal platform overlooking a thick cloud inversion filling the valley between sunlit Alpine peaks at dawn
Three young men standing on an alpine ridge at dusk with the Mont Blanc massif glowing pink with alpenglow behind them
Three friends bundled in warm jackets sitting on a stationary chairlift seat at dusk with a vivid orange sunset behind the mountains
Sweeping panoramic view from a high alpine ridge showing barren mountain slopes, winding paths, and distant snow-dusted peaks under a clear blue sky
A rustic wooden barn on a sloping alpine meadow with dense pine forests and rugged limestone peaks rising in the background
Two hikers in warm jackets on an alpine plateau at golden hour, one wearing a fur-lined hat, shot on film with warm tones and hazy mountains behind
Trail signpost pointing to Mont Joly and Blanchot silhouetted against a dusky sky with jagged Alpine peaks and the Mont Blanc range on the horizon, shot on film
Trail signpost for Mont Joly and Blanchot with the snow-covered Mont Blanc massif looming behind in soft twilight, shot on film
A sea of clouds filling the valley below with rocky mountain summits emerging like islands in warm morning light, shot on film
Two silhouetted figures photographing a cloud inversion and distant peaks from a metal viewing platform at dawn, shot on film
A lone figure standing on a vast autumn alpine meadow with a dramatic wall of limestone cliffs and layered valleys stretching into the distance, shot on film
Hiking trail signpost above a cloud inversion at sunset with signs for Megeve, Mont Joly, Grande Epaule, and Blanchot, mountain peaks in the pink twilight beyond, shot on film
Empty ski lift chairs crossing a golden grassy hillside at sunrise with silhouetted mountain ridges receding into the haze
Sunlit ridge leading to the summit of Mont Joly with an endless layered panorama of Alpine peaks fading into the morning haze
